text: Hijam Anganghal () (1892-1939) is one of the pioneer poets in the Meitei literature of Modern Manipur. He is best known for composing the 39,000 lined epic poem, the "Khamba Thoibi Sheireng" (based on the story of Khamba Thoibi), which is the masterpiece of all his literary works. ==Related page== * Lamabam Kamal ==Further reading== * http://e-pao.net/GP.asp?src=28..260415.apr15 ==Sources== * * * ==References== Category:Meitei people Category:Meitei literature
title: Hijam Anganghal
